MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL68 postcode area of Amlwch, affecting properties in a widespread area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:46 am on 16th October, 2020.
